item.title: EvalCards: A Framework for Standardized Evaluation Reporting
item.description: arXiv:2511.21695v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Evaluation has long been a central concern in NLP, and transparent reporting practices are more critical than ever in today's landscape of rapidly released open-access models.
